description: Timeout a user for a given period of time.
detailedDescription: This command can be used to timeout a user longer than the discord GUI allows. Using the command without the time parameter will remove the timeout.
successTimeout: User has been timed out for {{time}}.
noPermissions: You do not have the required permissions to time out this user.
alreadyMuted: This user is already timed out. Please try again {{time}}.
notMuted: This user is not timed out.
